verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> because his mercy
יֹֽאמַר־ <WH559> now say נָ֥א <WH4994> Oh יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Let Israel כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> that his mercy
יֹֽאמְרוּ־ <WH559> now say נָ֥א <WH4994> Oh בֵֽית־ <WH1004> Let the house אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> of Aaron כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> that his mercy
יֹֽאמְרוּ־ <WH559> say נָ֭א <WH4994> Oh יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> Let them now that fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> that his mercy

מִֽן־ <WH4480> at הַ֭מֵּצַ֥ר <WH4712> in distress קָרָ֣אתִי <WH7121> I called יָּ֑הּ <WH3050> upon the LORD עָנָ֖נִי <WH6030> answered בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב <WH4800> me [and set me] in a large place יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> the LORD
יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD לִ֭י לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אִירָ֑א <WH3372> [is] on my side I will not fear מַה־ <WH4100> What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> do לִ֣י אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> man

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD לִ֭י בְּעֹזְרָ֑י <WH5826> taketh my part with them that help וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I אֶרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> me therefore shall I see בְשֹׂנְאָֽי׃ <WH8130> [my desire] upon them that hate
ט֗וֹב <WH2896> [It is] better לַחֲס֥וֹת <WH2620> to trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD מִ֝בְּטֹ֗חַ <WH982> than to put confidence בָּאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> in man
ט֗וֹב <WH2896> [It is] better לַחֲס֥וֹת <WH2620> to trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD מִ֝בְּטֹ֗חַ <WH982> than to put confidence בִּנְדִיבִֽים׃ <WH5081> in princes

כָּל־ <WH3605> All גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> All nations סְבָב֑וּנִי <WH5437> compassed me about בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> but in the name יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> will surely אֲמִילַֽם׃ <WH4135> will I destroy

סַבּ֥וּנִי <WH5437> They compassed me about גַם־ <WH1571> yes סְבָב֑וּנִי <WH5437> yea they compassed me about בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> but in the name יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> will surely אֲמִילַֽם׃ <WH4135> I will destroy

סַבּ֤וּנִי <WH5437> They compassed me about כִדְבוֹרִ֗ים <WH1682> like bees דֹּ֭עֲכוּ <WH1846> they are quenched כְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> as the fire קוֹצִ֑ים <WH6975> of thorns בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> for in the name יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> will surely אֲמִילַֽם׃ <WH4135> I will destroy
דַּחֹ֣ה <WH1760> Thou hast thrust דְחִיתַ֣נִי <WH1760> sore לִנְפֹּ֑ל <WH5307> at me that I might fall וַ֖יהוָ֣ה <WH3068> but the LORD עֲזָרָֽנִי׃ <WH5826> helped
עָזִּ֣י <WH5797> [is] my strength וְזִמְרָ֣ת <WH2176> and song יָ֑הּ <WH3050> The LORD וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> has become לִ֝֗י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH3444> and is become my salvation

ק֤וֹל ׀ <WH6963> The voice רִנָּ֬ה <WH7440> of rejoicing וִֽישׁוּעָ֗ה <WH3444> and salvation בְּאָהֳלֵ֥י <WH168> [is] in the tabernacles צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> of the righteous יְמִ֥ין <WH3225> the right hand יְ֝הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD עֹ֣שָׂה <WH6213> doeth חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> valiantly

יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> The right hand יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD רוֹמֵמָ֑ה <WH7426> is exalted יְמִ֥ין <WH3225> the right hand יְ֝הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD עֹ֣שָׂה <WH6213> doeth חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> valiantly
לֹֽא <WH3808> I will not אָמ֥וּת <WH4191> I shall not die כִּי־ <WH3588> but אֶֽחְיֶ֑ה <WH2421> but live וַ֝אֲסַפֵּ֗ר <WH5608> and declare מַֽעֲשֵׂ֥י <WH4639> the works יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> of the LORD
יַסֹּ֣ר <WH3256> hath chastened יִסְּרַ֣נִּי <WH3256> me sore יָּ֑הּ <WH3050> The LORD וְ֝לַמָּ֗וֶת <WH4194> unto death לֹ֣א <WH3808> has not נְתָנָֽנִי׃ <WH5414> but he hath not given me over
פִּתְחוּ־ <WH6605> Open לִ֥י שַׁעֲרֵי־ <WH8179> to me the gates צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness אָֽבֹא־ <WH935> I will go בָ֝ם אוֹדֶ֥ה <WH3034> into them [and] I will praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> the LORD
זֶֽה־ <WH2088> This הַשַּׁ֥עַר <WH8179> This gate לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> into which the righteous יָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> shall enter בֽוֹ׃
א֭וֹדְךָ <WH3034> I will praise כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עֲנִיתָ֑נִי <WH6030> thee for thou hast heard וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> have become לִ֝֗י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH3444> me and art become my salvation
אֶ֭בֶן <WH68> The stone מָאֲס֣וּ <WH3988> refused הַבּוֹנִ֑ים <WH1129> [which] the builders הָ֝יְתָ֗ה <WH1961> has become לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> is become the head פִּנָּֽה׃ <WH6438> [stone] of the corner
מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> This is the LORD'S הָ֣יְתָה <WH1961> become זֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise הִ֖יא <WH1931> It נִפְלָ֣את <WH6381> doing it [is] marvellous בְּעֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> in our eyes
זֶה־ <WH2088> This הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> This [is] the day עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> hath made יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [which] the LORD נָגִ֖ילָה <WH1523> we will rejoice וְנִשְׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8055> and be glad בֽוֹ׃

אָנָּ֣א <WH577> now I beseech יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> thee O LORD הוֹשִׁ֘יעָ֥ה <WH3467> Save נָּ֑א <WH4994> we אָֽנָּ֥א <WH577> I beseech יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD הַצְלִ֘יחָ֥ה <WH6743> thee send now prosperity נָּֽא׃ <WH4994> I beseech thee

בָּר֣וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed הַ֭בָּא <WH935> [be] he that cometh בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֵּ֝רַֽכְנוּכֶ֗ם <WH1288> we have blessed מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> you out of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

אֵ֤ל ׀ <WH410> God יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> [is] the LORD וַיָּ֪אֶר <WH216> light לָ֥נוּ אִסְרוּ־ <WH631> bind חַ֥ג <WH2282> the sacrifice בַּעֲבֹתִ֑ים <WH5688> with cords עַד־ <WH5704> against קַ֝רְנ֗וֹת <WH7161> [even] unto the horns הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> of the altar
אֵלִ֣י <WH410> Thou [art] my God אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and I וְאוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <WH3034> and I will praise אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> thee [thou art] my God אֲרוֹמְמֶֽךָּ׃ <WH7311> I will exalt

הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy
